properties.query:
AIShield
| where Message has 'Timeseries Forecasting AI Model Extraction Attack Identified'
| where Severity =~ 'High'
| where SuspiciousLevel =~ 'high suspicious attack'
| extend NTDomain = tostring(split(Computer, '\\')[0]), HostName = tostring(split(Computer, '.')[0])

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: This query detects Timeseries Forecasting AI Model extraction high suspicious, high severity alert from AIShield generated at {{TimeGenerated}}.\n\nPlease check the source for more information and investigate further.
alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: AIShield -Timeseries Forecasting AI Model extraction high suspicious vulnerability detected.

properties.description: 'This alert creates an incident when Timeseries Forecasting AI Model extraction high suspicious, high severity vulnerability detected from the AIShield.'
properties.name: AIShield - Timeseries Forecasting AI Model extraction high suspicious vulnerability detection
